CHAT.comment: KAREN HOWSAM, ETC., Petitioners v. DEAN WITTER REYNOLDS, INC.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:02 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF ALAN C. FRIEDBERG ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF MATTHEW D. ROBERTS ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF KENNETH [*26] W. STARR ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
(Whereupon, at 12:03 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
